mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, FATHINDEXID, PRODUCTID, SAVENUM, SELLPRICE, COSTPRICE, WEIGHT, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURENAME, QUOTE, MINNUM, CHASEOPER, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPENFLAG, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, MONEYTYPE, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, NAME, ENNAME, PHOTOURL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, TITLE from db_productdevelopforson where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, FATHINDEXID, PRODUCTID, SAVENUM, SELLPRICE, COSTPRICE, WEIGHT, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURENAME, QUOTE, MINNUM, CHASEOPER, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, OPENFLAG, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, MONEYTYPE, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, NAME, ENNAME, PHOTOURL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, TITLE from db_productdevelopforson
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , FATHINDEXID , PRODUCTID , SAVENUM , SELLPRICE , COSTPRICE , WEIGHT , CATEGORYID , CATEGORYNAME , MANUFACTUREID , MANUFACTURENAME , QUOTE , MINNUM , CHASEOPER , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , OPENFLAG , FLAG , OPER , OPERTIME , CORPID , MONEYTYPE , RESERVE5 , RESERVE6 , RESERVE7 , RESERVE8 , NAME , ENNAME , PHOTOURL , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , TITLE

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FATHINDEXID = #{fathindexid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SAVENUM = #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANUFACTUREID = #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANUFACTURENAME = #{manufacturename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
QUOTE = #{quote,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
MINNUM = #{minnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CHASEOPER = #{chaseoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MONEYTYPE = #{moneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ENNAME = #{enname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
PHOTOURL = #{photourl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
